other.title: TIP #1
other.text:
A brain-control parasite has emerged in your city and paralyzed the local government.

You're on a 7-day journey to a train station for the only safe passage to get out of the city.

other.title: TIP #2
other.text:
The infected are like normal humans but super hostile towards the uninfected.

Don't provoke them unless necessary.

other.title: TIP #3
other.text:
Every outcome of an event is determined by your COMBAT, PHYSIQUE, EXPERIENCE, and CHARM.

Your supplies (FOOD, WATER, MEDS, and WEAPONS) sometimes also come into play.

other.title: TIP #4
other.text:
COBMAT affects how effective you can use melee weapons and guns.

PHYSIQUE decides your fitness and how well you can heal yourself.

other.title: TIP #5
other.text:
EXPERIENCE reflects your knowledge and the level of paranoia.

CHARM influences your persuasion on other people and morale.

outdoor.title: RAIDERS IN A DISTANCE
outdoor.text: You noticed some raiders are handing around in your route. You decide to:

result.text: You approach the raiders without caution. They knocked you down and took all your supplies and weapon.
You walked towards the raiders and used perfect martial art defeating them. You walked away with some of their supplies.
You used objects in the environment for you advantage and successfully went through the area without being seen.
You persuaded the raiders that you're a lonely survivor trying to survive just like them. They let you pass with accpetance.

outdoor.title: IT'S AN AMBUSH
outdoor.text: A group of raiders ambushed you, and they demand half of your supplies.

result.text: The raiders quickly took off with half of your supplies.

You suspected the ambush and gave them a decoy bag. While the raiders are searching for supplies, you already took off with all your stuff.
The raiders beat ypu up before taking all of your stuff.

outdoor.title: A HERD AHEAD
outdoor.text: There's a herd of infected moving in your direction. You decided to:

result.text:
When you started to change your course, some infected already caught up.

You had to fight off some infected on your way.
You left the area just in time before the swarm arrived. You could hear some gun shots from a distance.
Some infected found you. You tried to fight them off, but there were too many of them. You got hurt and lost some

You found a great hiding spot and waited until the swarm passed.

indoor.title: A RANDOM SURVIVOR
indoor.text: You discovered a survivor looting the same place. They didn't see you though.

result.text: Everything went okay. You and the survivor even exchanged surviving tips!
You couldn't trust the survivor, so you quickly took off without throughly looting the area.

indoor.title: AN UNWELCOME EXPLORER
indoor.text: During your exploration, you noticed a raider a few meters from you without knowing you're there.

indoor.title: A GROUP OF SURVIVOR
indoor.text: You met a group of survivors looting the same place. They saw you and waved.

indoor.title: THE PLACE IS ON FIRE
indoor.text: You suddenly smell smoke coming from all directions. THE PLACE IS ON FIRE!!! Your only exit is surrounded by fire.

result.text: When you decided to run, you didn't have enough time to pick up your stuff. But you made it out alive.
You ran fast enough to avoid the devouring of the flames.
You quickly planned out a route in your head, and executed it perfectly. You made it out without a burn.
You tried to go to the roof, but the supplies were slowing you down. You had to dispose half of them to make it in time. You went to the gorund through another route.
Your fitness training is finally now useful. You went to the roof without a sweat and made it to the gorund through another route.

result.text: Your hiding spot is so obvious that the infected laughed at you and forgot to attack you.
You were the hide-and-seek campion and knew what exactly where to hide. The infected searched the building and left without finding you.
You used your acrobat skills and managed to hung from the ceiling. The infected didn't you and left.
Some infected found you, but you managed to knocked them out before more were alerted.
The infected caught you running out of the building and beat the heck out of you. But you managed to run away with some bruises.
You ran so fast that the infected gave up chasing you.
You ran in a unpredictable snake route and confused all the infected. You got away when they were heading to find you in another building.
